long_description: The Mountainsmith Tyrol Pack sports sweet retro style and the comfort and convenience of a compact, top-loading pack for day hikes, travel and everyday use. Curved, padded shoulder straps, adjustable sternum strap and tuck-away hipbelt offer comfort and stability. Side adjustment straps connect the top of the pack to the hipbelt, allowing you to shift heavier loads closer to your body. Top-loading zippered main pocket contains a 3-liter hydration sleeve and hose port (reservoir not included); sleeve doubles as a laptop compartment. Inner zip hanging pocket attached to lid. Front panel drawcord bungee and gear loops let you attach more gear to the outside of the pack. Special buy.
short_description: The Mountainsmith Tyrol Pack sports sweet retro style and the comfort and convenience of a compact, top-loading pack for day hikes, travel and everyday use.
